website_summaries.verdict: With a solid wood core and competition-style padding, this beam will accommodate gymnasts up to 250 pounds. Just be sure to use it on carpet because it can slide on smooth tile and damage wood and laminate flooring.
pros: Measures 8 feet long and three inches high
Padded with cross-linked PE foam, which is the same padding that's used on competition beams
cons: Hinges on the bottom may slide on smooth flooring and scratch wood floors

customer_reviews.title: but I know regardless she will love it. My biggest complaint is I spent the ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't given this to my daughter yet, but I know regardless she will love it. My biggest complaint is I spent the extra money on this as it said it was 3" high, others were only listed as 2 in similar price/quality, but it is really only 2-1/8" high, which is honestly disappointing as it will not be as easy to grip and practice some of the thing hand stands and things since she won't be able to get hands fully around it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole MEyers

customer_reviews.title: Great for home practice
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old is really into gymnastics now. Having this beam at home helps her to practice a few things at home between sessions at the gym. It's great for her to be able to have this to reinforce what she is learning.
customer_reviews.author: cpphoto

customer_reviews.title: Awesome beam.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it! It's low enough that they don't hurt themselves when they fall off. It will leave marks in your floor where the beam folds, though, so don't move it around on the floor while it is unfolded.
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: There is a long screw that was described as being encased. Now have a long scratch on floor!
customer_reviews.author: Debra J Thraen

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking beam and my daughter was crazy excited when ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking beam and my daughter was crazy excited when she opened it, but the purple fabric is already ripping at the center of the beam and it's only day 2. : ( Needless to say, I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nessa Moghadam

customer_reviews.title: good starter beam
customer_reviews.text: Great starter beam for home use. The only problem is that the hinge stick out when opened so it is hard to lay flat on a hard surface, but works great on carpet. Easy to clean up and store. I like the beveled edge. 8 ft is almost to small. My 10 daughter stands on one end and finishes her cartwheel on the other with now room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Robins

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I got this beam for my eight year old who just started gymnastics. She loves it. There is a door type hinge that keeps the beams together, but since we will only be using it on the carpet the hinge doesn't get in the way. The original shipping estimate said I was going to get it after Christmas and I was a little disappointed... but to my surprise it arrived two days before Christmas! Super happy with this product. She can fold it up and put it away herself! Folds up nicely, and I am able to store it under her bed.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Yagong

customer_reviews.title: Beam it home For Gymnists
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed and does the job. Flips over for easy carting. Our three year old gymnast enjoys practicing in the living room between gym visits. There is a metal hinge on the bottom - please beware if planning to use on a hard wood floor as it will scratch it bad.
customer_reviews.author: VA Bill

customer_reviews.title: Drills at Home
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! The velvet covering is soft on her feet but not unsafe. She can grip well and do her drills at home (level 6). I put a yoga mat beneath it on my tile floor so it won't scratch or move. That works fine. It also works fine on the carpet. You would think she gets enough of a workout at the gym but she comes home and starts working on this beam. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Sunrise554

customer_reviews.title: Nice folding balance beam
customer_reviews.text: This beam is a nice addition to my grand daughters home gymnastics equipment. It is easily moveable, even for a 5 year old. It doesn't take up much room and it has the feel of a regular beam. the quality is pretty good. I did not give it 5 stars because the hinge is a little flimsy but since the beam is not subjected to harsh treatment it is fine. We gave this to our grand daughter for Christmas and she loves to practice her cartwheels and hand stands on it.
customer_reviews.author: Padap1113

customer_reviews.title: It folds up nicely. My only reason for not giving a 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is loving this! This was her birthday present and she has been on it nonstop. It is durable, yet padded. It folds up nicely. My only reason for not giving a 5 star is because the hinges don't look like they are bolted in as well as they should be...a little concerned how it'll be after months of use. I would still recommend this product despite that.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Balance beam is a great way to add variety to a workout
customer_reviews.text: Wanted this to add for some functional exercises at home - work on balance using kettle bells, etc. This is much nicer than I expected and has held up well. It is great that it folds so I can set it off to the side. If it is on the floor, it is like a magnet - nobody can walk past it without walking on it - including an 80 year old.
customer_reviews.author: TJB016

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: This beam is durable. It's a bit he heavy. My daughter smashed her fingers between the boards a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Dena C.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter was disappointed this is not a raised beam at first
customer_reviews.text: This beam is great!!!! My daughter Had wanted a raised beam at first, but realized learning to do back walk overs was better on the ground. This seems very well made. The fabric is soft and secure. It is easy for my kids to fold up and move around the house. ( 6 and 10 year old.)
customer_reviews.author: amazonshopper

customer_reviews.title: Great for practice in the house.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, folds away nicely. Daughter was happy to get it. Can't complain about anything at this time.
customer_reviews.author: AirAssualt

customer_reviews.title: but should be better for the
customer_reviews.text: Quality is ok , but should be better for the price
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Murch

customer_reviews.title: Great way for our gymnast to practice her routine at ...
customer_reviews.text: Great way for our gymnast to practice her routine at home. Suede-like surface is comfortable and beam is very sturdy. Folding feature gives us the ability to put it away easily when not in use. Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B.

customer_reviews.title: What I expected and more!
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered in two days, I have Prime, well packaged and protected in a cardboard box wrapped in bubble wrap. It was so nicely wrapped in bubble wrap, that became the gift wrap when i gave it to my grand daughter for her birthday. The beam itself is well constructed and sturdy and in use several times a day by all four of my grand daughters. I really hit the mark with this item. It could use something on the bottom to prevent sliding on wood floors but they use it on a carpeted floor mainly, problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Alfresco

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Beam to practice on
customer_reviews.text: My daughter initially really wanted a raised bar. But...I needed it to be folded and put away so this was my compromise. She loves it! It folds away super easy and is incredibly sturdy. I love buying from amazon for the backup on purchases they provide.
customer_reviews.author: hnlhair

customer_reviews.title: Gymnastics without the pain.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality beam. lightweight yet durable. Folds up and easy to store. Daughter loves this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Vengley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It is very sturdy and hinges with out being sloppy.
customer_reviews.author: Heywendygirl

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE!!! This beam is great for my daughter for practicing without being too far off the ground and the best part for me is it folds for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Ok not great.
customer_reviews.text: She loves the beam. It is not very professionally finished. Kind of home-made looking underneath. But it does the job well. High price for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Appears to be well made and it was ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Appears to be well made and it was the color my daughter wanted. I love that it folds in half for easy storage and that it is made of wood rather than all foam like most other foldable ones.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: It's just as described. Gave my daughter the confidence to perform several unassisted exercises on the regular beam after just a few days of practice. We keep it under the sofa and she uses it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Coach Brant

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality for the price. The handles are strong and make it convenient to carry. I ordered this for my 9-year old granddaughter to practice her gymnastics on and it works well for her.
customer_reviews.author: Allison K.

customer_reviews.title: good quality and heavy but not impossible to move
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it, good quality and heavy but not impossible to move. sturdy and a nice practice beam for her. exactly and pictured/described.
customer_reviews.author: Lacie and James Johnson

customer_reviews.title: They love it! I like that it folds in half ...
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our daughters (ages 10 and 3) for Christmas. They love it! I like that it folds in half for easier storage. It's a good size (width, height and length) for practicing at home. The only downside is that I wish the bottom had a non-skid surface on it. It slides a little on the hardwood floor if they jump.
customer_reviews.author: KindleGirl

customer_reviews.title: Works great on the mat.
customer_reviews.text: The girls love this thing and use it all the time..... ALL THE TIME...... it works very well. Get a mat for it if you have hard wood floors only. The hinge sticks out a bit and will scuff up the floor when setting it down otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: JohnE2Shoes

customer_reviews.title: Good quality...
customer_reviews.text: A little tricky to fold and store...it's too heavy for daily moving. Great idea for beginners, though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed so far!
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to our 9 year old daughter for Christmas. I'll report back in a month or so but I have to say, this is a HUGE HIT so far! Other than being only 8 ft, it's just like the floor beams they practice on at the gym. She's a Level 4 now and I can see this helping her beam skills a lot. Our 2 year old also loves "balancing" on the beam. We use it on plush carpet. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Art Larsen

customer_reviews.title: My daughters love their beam
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love their beam. I wish it had a traveling case so it would stay clean when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: GirlMom

customer_reviews.title: Great beam for home use
customer_reviews.text: Great balance beam for practicing skills at home. Unsafe on tile, laminate, or wood floors. Great on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Black Fire

customer_reviews.title: 6 year olf daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be a nicely quality made beam. It is covered in a suede like material that is soft on her feet and she likes that it sits on the floor just like the lowest beam at gymnastics. She approves.
customer_reviews.author: thoughtsbecomethings

customer_reviews.title: She loved it and uses it every day
customer_reviews.text: It was a birthday present for our 7 year old grand daughter, who is into gymnastics. She loved it and uses it every day.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Dye

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for our 10 year old gymnast for extra practice ...
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our 10 year old gymnast for extra practice in the basement. It's sturdy, easy to fold up, and has a soft, non-slip material covering it. Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.author: librarianchickie

customer_reviews.title: Beam has a slippery cover, not the traditional material ...
customer_reviews.text: Beam has a slippery cover, not the traditional material that covers a true balance beam. I would not order this if you have a serious gymnast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My grand daughter loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter loves it!! And her Mom loves it too as you can fold it and put away under the bed until it is used again

customer_reviews.text: This beam is very nice. It folds conveniently for storage. It has been a great help for my daughter in gymnastics.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this beam. It is holding up really well.

customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes it. It's pretty sturdy and it's nice how it folds up for storage. Feels like it's high quality.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nine year old daughter - it is a big hit! Folds up easily to store and works great for her to practice her gymnastics on. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: S. Berg

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it... I kind of thought there was a case from the picture... Still very nice
customer_reviews.author: J. J. Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I am 23 years old and am new to gymnastics, I bought this to practice at home and it is amazing. it feels like a standard beam. it's really durable and can withstand me and my husband jumping and flipping on it. it's a great product! really durable, stores easy, very portable and really fun.
customer_reviews.author: CupO' Noodles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect practice beam
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 year old daughter and have no complaints. I love that it folds in half for easy storage. It's also sturdy and well made. My daughter is able to fold and unfold it herself and loved the bright lime green color and soft suede cover. She has only been taking gymnastics for a year but I think this would work for more advanced gymnasts also. This is the perfect practice beam!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old daughter loves it uses it daily

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who is on a level 4 team. She has been using it to practice some elements of her routine, and also some new skills she is learning to move up to level 5 in a month. The beam is good quality and quite convenient because it folds up for easy storage. Easy to set up and use, she does it by herself (she's 9).
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Auman

customer_reviews.title: And it's easy to store
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 7 year old granddaughter who takes gymnastics lessons. She loves it! It's stable and safe. And it's easy to store.

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 7 year old Grandaughter for Christmas. I couldn't have bought her a better gift. Good quality. Excellent for practice.

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but nice
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this just about every day. It was all she kept asking for at Christmas. Seems well made, we'll see how long term durability goes.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for her to practice at home
customer_reviews.text: My 5 y/o loves it. Perfect for her to practice at home. Very sturdy and can be easily stored.

customer_reviews.title: pretty much plays on it everyday

customer_reviews.title: Love this beam
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my daughter to practice her gymnastics skills. It has held up extremely well & it used several times a week. I love that it folds up and can be stored behind our couch or under her bed!

customer_reviews.title: Beam
customer_reviews.text: The fold away beam is wonderful. It is not so heavy that it is not convent to move. Our daughter has used it everyday since it arrived.

customer_reviews.title: otherwise the item is pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the blue balance beam but what arrived was the standard brown beam. That's why I have this 3 stars, otherwise the item is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the beam!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 10 year old daughters birthday with no expectation at all. Well, it's a nice beam. It has a soft yet tough cover with the feel of a real beam. It's hefty enough to stay put when on the floor. And light enough for her to carry it around. It's just perfect as an in home practice beam.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Launer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Beam, Weak Hinges
customer_reviews.text: The beam is nice but the hinges that are holding it together are weak. When we open the beam they wobble and feel like the will break any day now.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been using this daily for 1 year now and it has very little sign of wear. Well built product you won't be disappointed. Beam is now her best event!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best feature of this product is its ablity to fold ...
customer_reviews.text: The best feature of this product is its ablity to fold up for storage or to transport. Nice product, but very overpriced for what you get.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great product,  easy to use and easy to store
customer_reviews.text: My girls love this beam. It is easy for them to handle themselves. I would recommend this product. this beam is strong and covered with a very soft suede material.

customer_reviews.title: Balance Beam
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition for a new gymnast to practice on the balance beam! And the product was shipped very quickly!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This fold-up beam is perfect for our aspiring gymnast. She uses the beam almost every day (she's level 4). And we, her parents, love it because we can fold it up and store it. Perfect!

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughters love it and so does my daughter
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters love it and so does my daughter. It is sturdy, well made and the best part is, it is portable. I highly recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves this beam, especially since she can carry it from room to room. She uses it every day and it is holding up well! Highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Covered in a velour like material, not vinyl
customer_reviews.text: It looks very nice but kind of flimsy. We plan to cover with vinyl to make the surface more durable.

We have a small house but this works just great!

product_meta.title: The Beam Store 8' Folding Balance Beam
feature_bullets: Wood-core, low profile folding balance beam for practice
Beam measures eight feet long and three inches high with a four-inch work surface
Heavy-grade synthetic suede covering provides look and feel of a competition beam
250 pound weight limit; covered under warranty
